verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: WASHINGTON] -- [ARG1: Kanye West] [V: remained] [ARG3: defiant] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-LOC: amid mounting backlash from fans over the rapper 's positive words about President Donald Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: tweeting a picture of himself wearing a " Make America Great Again " hat and criticizing former President Barack Obama] .

WASHINGTON -- Kanye West remained defiant Wednesday amid [V: mounting] [ARG1: backlash] from fans over the rapper 's positive words about President Donald Trump , tweeting a picture of himself wearing a " Make America Great Again " hat and criticizing former President Barack Obama .
